steps.name: When  I create a new product with title "Test Product" and price 99.99
Then  The response status code should be 201
And  The response should contain "Test Product"
When  I fetch the same product
Then  The response status code should be 200
And  The response should contain "Test Product"
When  I delete the same product
Then  The response status code should be 200
